home.description: +4 years of experience. Computer Engineer, FullStack Web Developer, and Mobile Developer. Focused on continuously learning new paradigms and technologies to apply the right solution in the right place.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: Hello!üëãüèª My name is Mois√©s Alvarenga and I'm from Paraguay. Currently, I'm in the final stage of my computer engineering education at the National University of Asunci√≥n. I'm passionate about all branches of computer science, although I'm primarily specialized in web and mobile development.
aboutMe.description2: years of experience in web development and 2 years in mobile applications, I love to stay updated with the latest technologies and trends to provide more effective solutions with better performance. I'm willing to learn new technologies, enjoy acquiring new knowledge, working in teams, and receiving feedback on my work as I consider it fundamental for my professional growth.
aboutMe.description3: Among other things I enjoy doing is contributing to open-source projects, as I recently did with the SVGl project. Outside of the professional realm, I'm passionate about music, traveling, and enjoying nature.

estudioObliquo.description:
• Development of web interfaces with Nuxt3 using the compositions API for a modular and maintainable architecture.
  • Implementation of internationalization with i18n, state management using Pinia, image optimization with @nuxt/image, use of TypeScript for typing, and application of coding standards with ESLint and Stylelint.
  • Use of Docker for project packaging.
  • Integration of headless CMS such as Tina, Strapi, and Sanity.
  • Creation of plugins in Strapi.

codingDojo.description:
• Acquisition of skills in component reuse and modularization for the development of scalable web applications.
  • Manipulation and storage of persistent data with MongoDB.
  • Construction of robust web servers using Express.js.
  • Advanced development of interactive and dynamic user interfaces using React.js.
  • Creation of server-side applications applying modern practices with Node.js.
  • Demonstration of skills in problem-solving and development of creative solutions in collaborative development environments.

fpuna.description:
• Development of skills in computer science for solving real-world problems through the construction of computational models and their implementation.
  • Ability to plan, design, and implement computer projects, evaluating system architectures.
  • Ability to work in teams and communicate efficiently both orally and in writing.
  • Critical analysis in the use of technologies for each project and implementation of efficient algorithms to optimize the performance and scalability of developed solutions.

contacts.title: Contact
contacts.description: If you have collaboration opportunities, job offers, or want to build something awesome, feel free to contact me!
